programme.title: Hum Hindustani
programme.desc: The Nath family faces hard times because of a property dispute. Things come to a head when one of the sons in the family is accused of theft.

programme.title: Kasme Vaade
programme.desc: Raju is guilt-ridden when his involvement with gangsters get his brother, Amit, killed. When he meets Shankar, Amit's lookalike, he decides to make amends, not realising who Shankar really is.

programme.title: Bholaa
programme.desc: After 10 years of imprisonment, Bholaa is finally going home to meet his young daughter. However, his journey is not so simple as he soon faces a pathway full of crazy obstacles, with death lurking around every corner.

programme.title: Farrey
programme.desc: After gaining admission into an elite school on scholarship, an orphan genius becomes entangled in a cheating racket when some of her rich friends lure her into helping them.

programme.title: Haseena Maan Jaayegi
programme.desc: Separated from their wealthy father and each other, two brothers (Govinda, Sanjay Dutt) try to win the hearts of their dream girls.

programme.title: Pardes
programme.desc: Emotionally attached to his motherland, a U.S. immigrant sends his son (Apoorva Agnihotri) back to India to seek a bride.

programme.title: Sam Bahadur
programme.desc: Sam Manekshaw is one of the most decorated officers in the Indian army, serving for over four decades and fighting in five wars. He is the first army officer to be promoted to the rank of Field Marshal.

programme.title: Singham Again
programme.desc: Drawing parallels to the Ramayana, Singham and his allies confront a mysterious antagonist in their quest to rescue his spouse.

programme.title: Don
programme.desc: A vengeful woman (Zeenat Aman) infiltrates the inner circle of a ruthless crime boss (Amitabh Bachchan).

programme.title: Jawan
programme.desc: A man is driven by a personal vendetta to rectify the wrongs in society, while keeping a promise made years ago. He comes up against a monstrous outlaw with no fear, who's caused extreme suffering to many.

programme.title: Laadla
programme.desc: A man teaches his arrogant wife to value love and family over wealth.

programme.title: Iqbal
programme.desc: A young deaf man wants to play cricket, but his father refuses to let him play. With help from his sister, they find a retired cricket player to teach him how to play.

programme.title: Krantiveer
programme.desc: A crusading journalist inspires an aimless man to fight for the rights of the poor.

programme.title: Jeena Isi Ka Naam Hai
programme.desc: Indian celebrities share stories of families and friends. (Hindi).

programme.title: Starry Nights
programme.desc: Welcome to a bare-all interview with host Komal Nahta, in conversation with the Bollywood biggies, from actors to directors and from singers to designers.

programme.title: Zubeidaa
programme.desc: The East Indian actress (Karisma Kapoor) gives birth to a son and marries a prince (Manoj Bajpai) before dying in a car crash.

programme.title: Uri: The Surgical Strike
programme.desc: Indian soldiers avenge a deadly terrorist attack.

programme.title: Guddu Ki Gun
programme.desc: Guddu finds himself in a quandary when his girlfriend's grandfather casts a spell on him after he cheats on her. Guddu must find true love and remain faithful to lift the curse.

programme.title: Rustum
programme.desc: A super cop is on a mission to end the organ trading mafia across the country and to get revenge for the brutal murder of a close friend.

programme.title: Phool Aur Kaante
programme.desc: A man (Ajay Devgan) springs into action to save his kidnapped son.

programme.title: Khiladiyon Ka Khiladi
programme.desc: A man (Akshay Kumar) searches for his missing brother (Inder Kumar) who is also wanted by the police.

programme.title: God Tussi Great Ho
programme.desc: God (Amitabh Bachchan) gives a constant complainer (Salman Khan) divine powers and challenges him to run the universe.

programme.title: NHK Newsline
programme.desc: NHK World-Japan's flagship news programme delivers the latest world news, business and weather with a focus on Japan and the rest of Asia.

programme.title: 72 Crucial Hours: Noto Earthquake
programme.desc: New Year's Day, 2024: Japan's Noto Peninsula is hit by a huge earthquake and tsunami - many lives are lost. One year later, as they look to the future, survivors share stories of courage and grief.

programme.title: NHK Newsline
programme.desc: NHK World-Japan's flagship news programme delivers the latest world news, business and weather with a focus on Japan and the rest of Asia.

programme.title: NHK World-Japan Special Programme
programme.desc: NHK World-Japan presents a wide range of programmes from news, current affairs, and documentaries focusing on Japan and Asia.

programme.title: NHK Newsline
programme.desc: NHK World-Japan's flagship news programme delivers the latest world news, business and weather with a focus on Japan and the rest of Asia.

programme.title: J-Melo
programme.desc: Japan's exciting music scene with pop, rock, traditional, live performances, artist interviews, all the latest news, video releases and more!

programme.title: Little Charo
programme.desc: Animated series about a Japanese dog who gets lost in New York City. Charo says 'I want to see my owner again!', and so he starts his adventure to find his way back home.

programme.title: Japanology Plus Mini
programme.desc: The waxing and waning moon has been loved, cherished, and given many special names throughout Japan's history - we explore the moon's continuing significance in agriculture, fishing, and daily life.

programme.title: A Cat's-Eye View Of Japan
programme.desc: Enjoy a warm kitty-welcome at a famous hot spring area! After visiting a popular cat duo at a ropeway station, stop by a restaurant, run by a kitty and its owner, where you can bathe too.

programme.title: NHK Newsline
programme.desc: NHK World-Japan's flagship news programme delivers the latest world news, business and weather with a focus on Japan and the rest of Asia.

programme.title: Cycle Around Japan Highlights
